### Overview
This is a 6-hour course on Genome Sequencing and Assembly held at the Rockefeller University in March 2021.

There are no system requirements for this course and all practical exercises will be performed using Galaxy.
Please create your <a href="https://usegalaxy.eu/">free Galaxy account</a> before the course begins. You can find extensive documentation on Galaxy <a href="https://usegalaxy.eu/training-material/">here</a>.
The exercize can be found <a href="">here</a>.

Course material and exercises are available to view as rendered HTML at https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/GenomeAssembly/.
All material is available to download under GPL v2 license.
